verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump and Emmanuel Macron] [V: enjoyed] [ARG1: an unlikely double date] [ARG2: with their wives] [ARGM-LOC: at George Washington 's house] [ARGM-TMP: as the French president 's visit to the US kicked off on Monday] .

President Donald Trump and Emmanuel Macron enjoyed an unlikely double date with their wives at George Washington 's house as [ARG1: the French president 's visit to the US] [V: kicked] off [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] .
